name: Manic Death Chase
overview: Manic Death Chase is a platform maze game where the screen scrolls left or right when you move your hero. You play the role of Pat who for reasons unknown is trapped in an underground cavern and has to attempt to escape. As you move along the platforms, you will encounter giant spiders or spikes and if you touch any then you lose one of three lives. There are also dead-ends but you are able to move back on yourself and jump to higher platforms.
